pages.text: Qul Siru Fi Al-'Ari Fanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablu Kana 'Aktharuhum Mushrikina
Fa'aqim Wajhaka Lilddini Al-Qayyimi Min Qabli 'An Ya'tiya Yawmun La Maradda Lahu Mina Allahi Yawma'idhin Yassadda`una
Man Kafara Fa`alayhi Kufruhu Wa Man `Amila Salihaan Fali'anfusihim Yamhaduna
Liyajziya Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Min Falihi 'Innahu La Yuhibbu Al-Kafirina
Wa Min 'Ayatihi 'An Yursila Ar-Riyaha Mubashiratin Wa Liyudhiqakum Min Rahmatihi Wa Litajriya Al-Fulku Bi'amrihi Wa Litabtaghu Min Falihi Wa La`allakum Tashkuruna
Wa Laqad 'Arsalna Min Qablika Rusulaan 'Ila Qawmihim Faja'uhum Bil-Bayyinati Fantaqamna Mina Al-Ladhina 'Ajramu Wa Kana Haqqaan `Alayna Nasru Al-Mu'uminina

Allahu Al-Ladhi Yursilu Ar-Riyaha Fatuthiru Sahabaan Fayabsutuhu Fi As-Sama'i Kayfa Yasha'u Wa Yaj`aluhu Kisafaan Fatara Al-Wadqa Yakhruju Min Khilalihi Fa'idha 'Asaba Bihi Man Yasha'u Min `Ibadihi 'Idha Hum Yastabshiruna
Wa 'In Kanu Min Qabli 'An Yunazzala `Alayhim Min Qablihi Lamublisina
Fanzur 'Ila 'Athari Rahmati Allahi Kayfa Yuhyi Al-'Ara Ba`da Mawtiha 'Inna Dhalika Lamuhyi Al-Mawta Wa Huwa `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
